title: Nem o mais exigente vai resistir: Mattel Games UNO The Legend of Zelda Card Game for Family Night with Graphics from The Legend of Zelda & Special Rule
excerpt: Nem o mais exigente vai resistir: Mattel Games UNO The Legend of Zelda Card Game for Family Night with Graphics from The Legend of Zelda & Special Rule

product.title: Mattel Games UNO The Legend of Zelda Card Game for Family Night with Graphics from The Legend of Zelda & Special Rule
product.description: Now you can play UNO in the company of your favorite Legend of Zelda characters!, The goal is to get rid of all the cards in your hand, and the first player or team to 500 points wins., Special action cards include Skips, Reverses, Draw Twos, and Wild cards., Powerful Triforce card forces the next player to draw 3 more cards!, A wonderful gift for Legend of Zelda fans, age 7 and older. Contains 112 cards plus instructions. Colors and decorations may vary.
